column4: Hello guys. I have a problem. I don't know if it's a problem with my hardware or with Ubuntu. Recently, very often, my computer turns off by itself, and, to restart it, I need to pull the plug and put it in again. This happens always when I start up my computer. Precisely when the writing "starting up" appears. What do you think?
think it might be suspending and not coming back?
ignore me i didnt read your whole post
